resources.string:
Hello, my name is Dennis. 

I'm going to type pretty much anything here so that the scrollview is able to scroll correctly. 

I do enjoy video games, exercising, and volleyball though. 

I'm still very new at the last two though, but I'll become better eventually. 

Chicken cooked any way is so good.(Not the breast though, too dry like 90% of the time). 

I like listening to all kinds of rock and classical songs 

Yep that should be enough to get this thing working.
